World Bicycle Relief

In the hands of a student, healthcare worker or entrepreneur, a bicycle can be life changing.

Client

World Bicycle Relief

Role

Creative Direction, Design

Team

Blue State Digital

Live Site

worldbicyclerelief.org

In the hands of a student, healthcare worker or entrepreneur, a bicycle can be life changing. World Bicycle Relief provides durable bikes to countries all across Africa. We updated their site to raise awareness of their programs and to increase involvement in the program.
